title: The Party by Blake Edwards
content:
Hi.   
Can you help me on this one? This sample comes from a poor DVD screenshot.   
 ![The Party](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47751.jpg)
author: Gregory Cadars

comments.content: can't see your attachment but LOVE that movie.

I'm sure it cames from a complete typeface cause the actors names are written with this. perhaps they did a font "on-the-fly"? ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)

You could try posting it on [what the font.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121544/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/)   
   
Best to convert it to greyscale first.
It resembles Ray Larabie's ['Sybil Green'](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121544/http:/www.larabiefonts.com/fonts/s3.html) which is based (I thought) on the lettering of Mary Engelbreit.
